description: In the first part of this seminar, students examine, on the basis of common readings, some broad literary topic. In the second, they undertake individual research projects, share and respond to each other's work-in-progress, and present their completed project to the seminar. May be repeated if topics are different. Prerequisites: English 185 plus one additional course of relevant background.
name: Sem: Money and Virtue
prerequisites: Prerequisites: English 185 plus one additional course of relevant background.
title: Major American Authors
